page.title: 09Spare Time/S.Wigston
page.content: {The colloquial speech of S.Leics. {children is exemplified by the {following writing. I live in between South Wigston and Blaby.My dad works at Glen Parva borstal.Me and my family like to go to the park and have a picnic and I go with my dad to the club.I like going swimming with my mum and dad at Wigston pool.Me and my mum go to the shops after school to get her shopping. There is a Methodist church and I used to go to girls brigade there on a Thursday after school.There is another church and you can go Brownies every Wednesday.There is a garage called ESSO and my dad goes for petrol.There is a bowling green on the park and after school I go to see my grandma. {(Child from Parklands School).
